lines.text: I better get straight from this!
Don't you know there's something more beautiful in this world than that thing between your legs?
So I sucked a cock.
Ow! That is not a wig!
Women's liberation has told me just WHO I AM and what I should be!
They're not gonna think we're lesbians, Holly! A school teacher and a model? Those are lesbians?
Take your balls and go!
Take a bath! You smell like a dead papa!

[to Duncan]
I'm sick and fed-up. Of you and all men. How do ya like them apples?
You read too many comic books, Holly. You're living in a dream world.

[to Holly]
Who told you to bring me that plant? I need that plant? I already got a shrub in there!
She's got beauty, she's got everything. What the fuck do we have? Nothing!
She comes from Long Island, Holly!
I think she has tendencies. I think she's hiding under that cloak.
What cloak? She's garbage!
A raincoat! Don't you understand? Figuratively!
I wish I could afford a fuckin' wig!

[to Holly]
You're not doing a root canal on his anus!
What's the name of it? PIGS? That's attractive... Oh I see, Politically Involved Girls.
What do you mean come down off the trapeze into the sawdust? That's circus talk!
I don't want anything to do with you or your girl question mark friends!
I don't have anything against men, I just want more money, that's all.
You want money? Go out and earn it!

I was reading the obituary column today and there was this woman - you won't believe this, but... She left all of her money to a dog! Now what is her dog gonna do with all that money? We could use that.
Rub her legs, won't you? Get her going, will you?
Betty, you're fucked up. Why don't you tell us about an unpleasant incident with a male?
What are you itching about?
To fuck.
You're itching... you're itching to fuck?
You're terrible! Why don'tcha smile?
You're a big girl, aren't you?
I was captain of the volleyball team.
Are you gonna come?
Um... I think I'm gonna go.

I was gonna set you up in North Beach with an electric typewriter so it would never be hard on you again! I felt sorry for this bitch! Limping every day down Madison Avenue, they used to yell, "There goes Clubfoot Annie!"
I need that beer, the doctor prescribed it to calm down my nerves! Baby, stop freaking out! Calm down! Shut up!
All these people follow me home. I had this one, this one little midget. He was on 42nd Street...
He was on forty Seconals?
